name: WEAVER (Galvin Green)
description:
You are a Weaver, an Alien Parasite lost on a derelict human space station where you must try to survive and jump from host to host to brave the perils of what comes next in the foodchain

Features

Controls:
WASD Move,
Space to Lunge/Jump,
E To Eject,
Left Click to Shoot,
Mouse - Aim.

Credits

Galvin Green (@GalvinTheGreen) — Developer
Hamza Ulla — Sound Effects and Music
Placido Garcia — Art and Animation
Anand Papineni (@FakePepeneros) — Game Design
